entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 9 except 15 inland.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9 except 15 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023
